title: New: LAY BAC – With You, With Me
content:
We’ve known for a while that Texan duo LAY BAC are crazy bros; from their electrifying music to their sexually provocative videos, these dudes know how to party, however new cut With You, With Me takes the mindfxck to all new levels.

Opening with three short blasts, the track seemingly samples itself several times, before tumbling and twisting into dance-your-feet-off 80’s inspired number. The vocal samples are never more than a matter of milliseconds and the pitch-bending comes in somewhere between 8-bit and Dilla. Fucking fantastic.

Check out With You, With Me below, and watch out for Short Cuts released through ZOOM LENS later this month.

WITH YOU, WITH ME by LAY BAC
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
